item.title: Back Online After Migrating DBs
item.description: Maybe you haven’t noticed, but its been a few months since my last blog post. The reason being two fold: I migrated my blog db from MySQL to Cloudant. The WYSIWYG editor on my dashboard wasn’t ready. Now that I’ve got an alpha 1.
